name: Without Escape
description: Without Escape is a point-and-click horror game in which players must investigate gruesome, unearthly events that have begun to manifest in their own home.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: SSE2 Compatible Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 11 Compatible DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 350 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: SSE2 Compatible Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 11 Compatible DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 512 MB available space
